title: Bottom Speaker stopped working - and I'm stuck in another country for a while
content:
Hi Google, 

The bottom speaker stopped working and I cannot find a way to contact your support center or claim for a refund. 

With COVID-19 situation, I'm currently stuck in Russia with no way to make it to North America or Europe in the coming months as the borders are on the lockdown. 

Can someone assist me to get a refund for a phone that was purchased on December 19, 2019?

Please help.
